name: Xenomorph 7drl of Infinite Underworld
description:
In the Infinite Underworld you take a role of the monster Xenomorph. 

You are peacekeeper. Enemy army aproach your city and you was unleashed as last hope for great city.

You will hunt humans to protect other humans... Or you just make cocoons from them and make a nice horrific horde of bloody monsters? You will feel how horrific horde smash every enemy defence.

This is the turn-based roguelike RPG game from 7drl challenge 2018.  Made by Anohin Denis (CoolAI) in seven days (and will be updated after finishing contest).

Xenomorph 7drl is 1st game of Infinite Underworld series. There are will be more of them. Second one is in 2 months distance of this.
